headline: 3 No-Brainer Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now for Less Than $200
summary: Dividend stocks can be no-brainer investments.  Over the last 50 years, the average dividend stock in the S&P 500 has outperformed non-dividend payers by more than 2 to 1, with the best performance coming from dividend growers.  Dividend growth stocks have delivered a 10.2% average annual return, compared to 4.3% for non-payers, according to data from Ned Davis Research and Hartford Funds.
